1173.name: Dur 62 S
1173.Applications: Extreme abrasion resistant hardfacing alloy offering excellent wear resistance with medium impact. To be used for applications where release cracks are needed for good bonding.
1173.Suitable_For: Slag crushers, Mixer blades, Digger teeth, Guides, Coal mining, buckets, pumps, screws, loaders, sand winning, cement industry, wear plates, loaders etc.
